The Tamil Nadu Corporation for Development of Women will organise a job fair on Saturday from 9 a.m. for youths of Thuraiyur and Uppilliyapuram panchayat unions. Candidates with qualifications from SSLC to graduation and ITI and diploma holders from these unions can participate in the fair to be held at the Vimala Matriculation Higher Secondary School, Thuraiyur. Interested candidates can appear in person along with relevant certificates, Collector K.S.Palanisamy said in press release.

Labourer injured

Sathish of Tiruvannamalai, a labourer, sustained injuries when a metal shed that was being erected for a book fair on the Corporation ground at Thennur collapsed on Friday evening and he was taken to hospital. Police said the shed was being erected for the book fair that was scheduled to begin from March 3. The labourer was engaged in the shed installation work when it suddenly collapsed causing injury in his left hand.
